trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2017 Download and Installation on what do before installing Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2017 Download and Installation on what do before installing Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: What do I need to do before installing Visual Studio?
trans-unit.target: What do I need to do before installing Visual Studio?

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio Installer will help you install the tools, packages, and SDKs needed by your workload and component selections.
trans-unit.target: The Visual Studio Installer will help you install the tools, packages, and SDKs needed by your workload and component selections.

trans-unit.source: To minimize incompatibility and ensure a smooth installation experience, we recommend going through the following checklist to ensure that your computer is ready for Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: To minimize incompatibility and ensure a smooth installation experience, we recommend going through the following checklist to ensure that your computer is ready for Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: 1. Check your operating system and apply the latest Windows Updates: You can see the system requirements for Visual Studio 2019 here and for Visual Studio 2017 here.
trans-unit.target: 1. Check your operating system and apply the latest Windows Updates: You can see the system requirements for Visual Studio 2019 here and for Visual Studio 2017 here.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio requires Windows 7 Service Pack 1 or newer, and runs best on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio requires Windows 7 Service Pack 1 or newer, and runs best on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: • Reboot before beginning the Visual Studio installation: This ensures that any pending installations or updates don’t hinder the Visual Studio installation.
trans-unit.target: • Reboot before beginning the Visual Studio installation: This ensures that any pending installations or updates don’t hinder the Visual Studio installation.

trans-unit.source: • Ensure there is enough space on your SystemDrive before installing Visual Studio. Refer to the Visual Studio 2019 System Requirements to check the free space required for installation.
trans-unit.target: • Ensure there is enough space on your SystemDrive before installing Visual Studio. Refer to the Visual Studio 2019 System Requirements to check the free space required for installation.

trans-unit.source: If you need more space, you can run the Windows Disk Cleanup App.
trans-unit.target: If you need more space, you can run the Windows Disk Cleanup App.

trans-unit.source: For questions about running previous versions of Visual Studio side-by-side with the newer version, see the compatibility details for Visual Studio 2019 here and for Visual Studio 2017 here.
trans-unit.target: For questions about running previous versions of Visual Studio side-by-side with the newer version, see the compatibility details for Visual Studio 2019 here and for Visual Studio 2017 here.
